Description: AVAILABLE 9/1 AMAZING CONDO RENOVATION STEPS FROM DAVIS Very rare offering in converted schoolhouse just STEPS from Davis Square! Privately owned condo on the third floor with walk-out porch, skylight, and HUGE rooms. Galley kitchen with dishwasher, disposal, stove with vent, and microwave, Hardwood floors throughout and a bonus storage room is included across the hall, one OFF STREET parking space included. No pets please. Available for a September 1st move in.
